scripts.burgerBackOffice: .\node_modules\.bin\cypress run --browser %npm_package_config_firefox% --spec cypress/e2e/navigationBurger/mw_navigation_burgerMenuBackOffice.js --reporter cypress-mochawesome-reporter --reporter-options "reportDir=cypress/reports/burgerMenuBackOffice, inlineAssets=true, charts=true, embeddedScreenshots=true, reportPageTitle='Matrix Web Burger Menu BackOffice'"
